document_data.name: Dakath
document_data.mainbody: '''Dakath''' was a [[half-elf]] fighter from [[Nesmé]]. He died around [[1264 DR]]<ref>eleven decades before 1374 DR while wearing the [[Shield Belt of Storms]], which led to the belt being taken to [[Zelphar Arunsun]] in [[Blackstaff Tower]].
